name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CD Bmto292 109
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CD Bmto292 109 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Pirates of Donkey Island
description: A terrible curse ruined your royal wedding, placing your soul into your pirate grandfather's body. Now you must lead a crazy crew that consists of a gorilla gentleman, an undead rock star, a fast-aging Voodoo crone, and a ridiculous spokesman. The challenges in this adventure are inspired by Monkey Island and Pirates of the Caribbean.

name: Cosplay Relaxation
description: Sin descripción

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash
• Hidden Inventory/Premature Death
• Jujusta 2024

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash
• Hidden Inventory/Premature Death
• Anime Ending Theme 1 Outfit Set
• Jujusta 2024
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack

name: Anime Paradise: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tama & Friends: 3-match Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Razerwire: Nanowars - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream Town Story
description:
Tired of tedious town simulators taking up your time? Develop dream dwellings down to the last brick and construct cityscapes crawling as far as the eye can see in this stimulating simulation game! Compete with other towns in the rankings, or take it easy and go at your own pace.

Build houses to have people move into your town, then add shops and lots of other facilities, making it a vibrant, lovely place to live. Stores like the bike shop or car dealer will sell vehicles to your residents, allowing them to travel further and visit more places. Acquire more areas as your town grows, discover new facilities to build, help the residents find new jobs, plan the town down to the last detail to make sure it's convenient for everyone... There is just so much to do!

name: Id Action Pack Vol. 4
description: A bundle of two Quake games and Doom.

name: The Dragon Prince: Xadia
description: Explore Xadia, team up with friends, and battle evil forces in this hack & slash looter ARPG.

name: Chicken Run: Eggstraction
description: Sin descripción

name: Netflix Stories: Money Heist
description: Join the heist that started it all in Netflix Stories: Money Heist. Enter La Perla Museo de Barcelona alongside the Money Heist crew, but tread carefully! Your choices will determine the success of the Professor’s perfect plan.

name: Mutant Boxing League
description: Box against fantasy creatures in open environments. Exercise while having fun!

name: Skyforce Unite!
description:
Amazing Aerial Combat Simulation Attack Monsters in the Uncivilized Land!
Get yourself a plane and fly through the wild blue yonder!
Take on missions for the Hunters Association, explore the world and battle monsters. Create your very own team of helpers, mercenaries and apprentices, and head out on expeditions!

name: Koko
description:
Seiichi, a boy who has always lived near a forest in the middle of a small town, grew up hearing stories of monsters and fairies. When the time came to start a new life, he moved to the city, unlucky enough to get lost in one of those areas inhabited by non-human beings. Will he get out of there? Or what decision will he make?

"Her fingers looked like little spider legs on my clothes."

name: Spiegel Ei
description: You play as a young girl named Ei Eulenspiegel who is taken into an orphanage. She comes across a large mirror that allows her to explore between two worlds: The real world which is inside an old mansion, and the mysterious mirror world that lies beyond. As she travels back and forth between dreams and reality, her psyche gradually becomes distorted. Will she find herself or will she lose herself?

name: Ludus: Merge Arena
description: Welcome to Ludus! Fight fast-paced battles, defend your army in real time in PvP with other players! Enjoy the unique gameplay of this merging game! Build a deck of heroes, make it a tower of your strength, defend your squad, win battles, beat armies from around the planet, be the strongest PvP player!

name: Dr. Mario DX
description:
This hack transforms Dr. Mario Game Boy game into a Game Boy Color game.

Enjoy the Game Boy classic now in full color with a very cool new feature: character selection! That’s it! Dr. Luigi, Dr. Daisy and Dr. Wario join the virus battle! Choose your favorite doctor to play as, each one with their own sprite, palettes.

It also has a couple of slight QoL tweaks to the original game code.

name: Super MiniJolt
description:
This is Super MiniJolt! Not a military program!
We aim to make a game full of minigames and you are more than welcomed to join!
We don’t need professionals, we need people with creativity!

name: Pokémon Procyon and Deneb
description:
A ROM hack of Pokémon FireRed and a sequel to Pokémon Vega. It aims to be a completely original fan-made Pokémon experience, featuring the brand new region of Setoguni, over 100 new Pokémon including new evolutions of official Pokémon, new moves and mechanics, and a new storyline.

Its most recent beta was released on April 1st, 2018, and the project has been in indefinite hiatus ever since.

name: Carol Shaw's River Raid
description: Sin descripción

name: Steeplechase
description: Sin descripción

name: Food Fight
description: You play as Charley trying to eat an ice cream cone. But first you must avoid the chefs that are out to get you: Angelo, Zorba, Oscar, and Jacques. Avoid the food thrown at you by the chefs to get the cone. You can also throw your own food at the chefs to slow them down.

name: Food Fight
description: You play as Charley trying to eat an ice cream cone. But first you must avoid the chefs that are out to get you: Angelo, Zorba, Oscar, and Jacques. Avoid the food thrown at you by the chefs to get the cone. You can also throw your own food at the chefs to slow them down.

name: Captivity Horror Multiplayer
description:
Captivity is a multiplayer horror game in which you play the role of a patient who was being used as a guinea pig for multiple terrible experiments carried out by a corporation that was working on a top-secret government project for a long time until something went wrong.

Your mission is to ally with other patients to get out of the facility, but it won't be easy since the place is full of hostile patients, good luck!

name: Food Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R
description: Upgraded version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6

name: The Ghost: Survival Horror
description:
You were getting your daily treatment with friends at the New Wishlie Hospital for 2 weeks already, and today was time to get discharged from the hospital. But something happened. You woke up at 2 AM and found out that all the patients were gone, except you and your friends. The place looks much muddier and it’s... locked! You read in magazines about the hospital and turns out that it's haunted. Now It seems like the only way to escape is through the garage door. Will you be able to get away by the time the ghost devours your soul?

Emily and Leila were studends and best friends. They lived in a small house in a town with almost no people. It was Sunday, and it was routinuous for them to visit the cemetery together. Only this time, for some reasons, Emily felt she would better stay home. So she decided to stay home. Looking out of window, Emily sees strange creature creeping behind her sister... The next day after Leila's absence, she runs to school for help. On her way to get inside the school, the main school gate closes behind her. Now locked inside the school area, the next thing she notices are students who struggle to survive..

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR
description: Second upgraded version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6

name: Goober Dash
description: Goober Dash: A 2D platformer battle royale where Goobers Run, Jump & Dash to victory! Customize your Goober, dash to outmaneuver opponents, create your own levels, and compete in global time trials. Unlock exclusive skins and celebrate your wins in this action-packed multiplayer Race Royale!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Saha and Rebirth
description:
Version 6.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Rebirth
• New ELF: Project Bunny
• New Story Chapter XXXIX: Daughters of the Sea
• New Captainverse Event: Before the Endless Dream Ends
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Straying Stars
description:
Version 6.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Sugary Starburst
• New Story Chapter XXXVIII: Lone Tower, Fallen Star
• New Featured Event: ☆Perfect Performance☆
• ...and more!

name: Bulanci
description: Bulanci is an action multiplayer and easy-to-play party game where you take pillow fights with your frenemies to the next level. Make your sleepless nights memorable by being fluffy and deadly!

name: Dead Letters
description: Your mission is to enter the mansion of the dead magnate who killed his family and committed suicide. When still alive, he hid many treasures but nobody knows where. Look for his diary to be able to find them.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Woven from Last Snow
description:
Version 6.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Dreamweaver & Terminal Aide 0017
• New Story Chapter XXXVII: Of Salt, Snow, and Sand
• New Featured Event: TeRiRi's Magical Quest
• ...and more!

name: The Way of All Flesh-Again
description: This add-on does not change the history of the episode, it only allows you to play it in an alternate way. There are 8 new levels and new textures from games such as: F.E.A.R., Kingpin, Redneck Rampage, Witchaven (1,2), Duke Nukem 3D, Shadow Warrior, NAM, WW2GI, TEKWAR, Manhunt, etc

name: Final Alone in the Dark
description: This final compilation of BAITD series lets you play (almost) all parts of the mod. BAITD is a pure experimental mod that shows to players new ways to mod the game and dedicated to original Alone In The Dark game series.

name: Grove
description:
"Grove” is an M/M focused NSFW RPG following the journey of an adventurer as he attempts to venture into the far north of an unexplored land. You play as Grove, a skilled dragon explorer and cartographer assisting in the main island colonisation.

As parties disperse, individuals begin to disappear further towards the cusp of the north. Soon, rumours of curses and monstrous entities encroaching from the northern expanse begin to spread among your ranks. As you near the end of your allocated survey areas, you are given a strange contraption with a marked map, the only guide to its function.

Your interest piqued, you set off and begin your journey into the northern expanse.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Hot Sands Escapade
description:
Version 6.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of Part 1.5 of the main story, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Valkyrie Quicksand
• New Story Chapter XXXVI: Hailing from Nagazora
• New Featured Event: Meow Town Escapade
• ...and more!

name: Epsilon
description: In 2008, the largest particle accelerator ever created, the LHC at CERN's particle physics lab in Switzerland, was activated for the first time. The research obtained from this experiment has revolutionized the way we think about science. Un-answered questions that have puzzled man since the dawn of humanity are finally being answered. Are there extra dimensions? What is dark matter? Is time travel possible? Epsilon Experimental Sciences Research Facility aims to discover the potential of this whole new world of science, and you have been appointed as the primary test participant.

name: Eviction
description: Eviction (or EVICTION) is a new episode fan add-on released gradually since 2017 by Austin "SpillSomeBlood" Adams. As of 2021, it features four single-player levels and one Bloodbath map. As of the part four iteration, it features five new enemies and custom scripting requiring either the NBlood port or its fork Raze

name: Somewhere Under the Sea
description: A three level level episode released on March 12, 2015 based on Adam's earlier "Rapture" map inspired by the underwater city from Bioshock.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: From Finality, The Origin
description:
Version Kiana (6.4) of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the end of Part 1 of the main story, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Herrscher of Origin & Herrscher of Finality
• New ELF: Kiana Kaslana
• New Story Chapter XXXV: Toward a New Tomorrow
• New Animated Short: Graduation Trip
• New Featured Event: Bustling Holiday Symphony ∶||
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Symphony of Truth
description:
Version 6.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Truth
• New Story Chapter XXXIV: The Moon's Origin and Finality
• New Featured Event: Bustling Holiday Symphony ||∶
• ...and more!

name: Blood Chronicles Volume 1
description:
Yet another huge collection of blood maps.

Episode One: Underworld "tells the tale of Caleb's search for the Cabal's newest horror, The Grand Illusion Carnival, with plans to shut it down before it entraps any victims. The rumour is that there is a forgotten teleport back in one of the old Cabal mines that will put Caleb right at its front door."

name: Blood Chronicles Volume 2
description: Blood Chronicles aims to be the best blood map collection. Only the very best of Blood Community!

name: My Sister is Wanted
description: A mouse lost in time and the crimes of their family

name: Hamster Club
description: A training simulation game that raises hamsters and aims to become a breeder master. Select one of the three animals, "Shigecchi", "Boo-chan", and "Endo-kun", and raise and breed them based on the funds you have. If you participate in various competitions (cups), you will compete for the hamster's ability and cuteness. Up to 4 hamsters can be kept in one cage at the same time. Of course, it is compatible with communication cables and can print cute hamsters.

name: Netflix Stories: Virgin River
description: Netflix Stories: Virgin River is a interactive narrative game that was announced in August 2023 along with Netflix Stories: Love is Blind and Netflix Stories: Money Heist from the developer Boss Fight Entertainment exclusively for the Netflix Games service.

name: Banzai's Addon
description: Banazai's Add-On (also known as Caleb's Revenge and previously Game Leader's Unofficial Add-On) is a single episode fan add-on for Blood featuring seven levels, last updated on November 9, 1998 by Team BANZAI. Partly to facilitate its final release and to lower the download size in the days of largely dial-up connections, it features only new levels and does not contain any new textures, weapons or monsters.

name: The Cult
description: BLOOD: the Cult is a new episode that contains 5 single player maps for original Blood.

name: The Dreamwell Enigma: Barlington Estate
description: Explore Master Barlington's estate, also home to his exclusive gentlemen's club including some prominent figures of the area, owners of influential businesses; Cobbleson & Son's Crimson Brewery, Leroux's M'daillon Bathhouse, Ashford's Bank and Trust, etc. Strange activities have been taking place at the estate and these men are likely involved. Rumours also spread about a new religious cult forming and gossip regarding Barlington's mental health as of late. Sudden disappearances have been reported surrounding the area, but no concrete evidence pointing to the club itself. What secrets are they hiding? Break inside, rummage around, seek documents and discover the truth, no matter how far you must dig to find it.

name: The Pandemonium
description: A single map that includes rotating doors, explosive walls ,respawning monsters, and more

name: Hall of the Epiphany
description: A two level mini-episode that chronicles the final battle in the Hall of the Epiphany

name: The Hall of Epiphany
description:
Fight your way through the dark realm and seal the rift once and for all!
You've reached the Hall Of Epiphany, now it's time for revenge! In order to summon Tchernabog's presence, you'll need to fight your way through the "Army Of Darkness". Once you finish the 3 main bosses, T-daddy opens a portal for you to return for the final battle. Once on the other side, you see Ophelia's soul trapped and tormented. You are now face to face with Tchernabog. The only way to set Ophelia free a end the Cabal, is to destroy T-daddy himself!

name: Out for Blood
description: Out for Blood is a six large level fan add-on (with one secret level) for Blood by Thomas "BloodyTom" Ziehl, later author of Trauma Therapy, released on August 3, 2019

name: Maniac Mansion 4 Blood
description:
Loosely based on the 1987 point & click adventure Maniac Mansion by Lucasfilm.
If you enjoy running around in a huge house with a great variety of places then you might want to try this one.

name: La Ciudad Fantasma
description: A small city

name: Legends of Iconoclast: Scourge of Humanity
description: Take on the role of Logan, a Romanian gunsmith as he embarks on an epic quest of revenge and redemption as he journeys into an unknown dimension and wages war on the most powerful army to have ever existed: the Scourge, founded by the evil Garibaldi, a power-mad misanthropist hell-bent on the extermination of mankind. Logan must prevent the Scourge from resuming its war on Earth to save humanity and to avenge the deaths of everyone involved, including his own true love. During his quest, he'll uncover the shocking truth about Garibaldi and the plight of this unknown dimension. He must fight his way through Garibaldi's castle and ultimately confront Garibaldi in a battle to determine the fate of both humanity and the realm of Iconoclast.

name: Legends of Iconoclast 2: Unfinished Business
description: This sequel focuses on the protagonist continuing his war on the organization that he was once part of as he seeks to tie up a few loose ends, confront his internal demons, and once more save the world.

name: The Carnage Continues
description: The Carnage Continues is a modification for Blood that was developed over several years, with it being finally released on January 4, 2006, although the author commented that it could never be finished entirely as intended. The add-on was created by Harry, with one level jointly developed with Joel "Reactor" Blackwell (co-creator of Gods, the Epic Trilogy from 1998).

name: The Lost Episode
description: The Lost Episode is a unofficial add-on for Blood that adapts eight level files found in the Blood Alpha release and makes them into a coherent whole; speculated to be drafts by James Wilson III. Put together by Maz/kingmaz and released on November 27, 2014.

name: The Lost Episodes
description: Five dark tales of terror lost to the void of time, now available for your edification. From some of the best creators of Blood maps, this five adventure set promises to challenge the most avid Blood fan! A Collection Of Hard To Find Episodes Gathered Together In One Carnage-Filled Collection Including GODS by Joel & Kurt Blackwell, Journey to Hell by Martin Brintnall, Legend of Ravenloft by Michael Shire, Killing Time by Marc Levesque, Haunted Realmsby Joel Dube with additional maps by Treks, Johnnie Blaster, Craig L. Duckett & Dwayne Anderson. Adding Up To 23 Levels of Hardcore Gorefest

name: Cosmic Guerilla
description: Basicly a Space Invaders clone in which the aliens are aligned on the far left and right side of the screen. They move into the middle of the screen in order to snatch their prey and bring them back to the far left or right side respectively. The player's task is to prevent this.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 4
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 3, featuring 33 new songs and voice samples for combos like '50 combo!' '100 combo!' etc.

name: Haunted Hill
description: Caleb has bought an old mansion where he plans to settle down. The previous owners died under strange circumstances, and the mansion has been empty for years. But arriving Caleb finds out that his dreamhouse might not be what he expected. He finds it "infested" by the Cabal. And it seems the previous owners were up to no good either. Caleb must rid the house of the "pest" in order to finally get peace.

name: Meat Factory
description: Single player level done in the industrial style of E3M5 or BB3

name: Evil Dwells Within
description: This is the first map in an episode entitled "Crudox Cruo: Fresh Blood" which was never made.

name: Nitemare
description: This map takes place in some kind of huge and complex castle with it's own sewer system

name: Six Keys
description: Caleb must find the six keys by solving the puzzles, then use them to release Tchernobog and escape from the island.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 5
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 4, featuring 34 new songs, selecting songs before the difficulty mode, but can't choose the Donderful difficulty in this mode; The Futsuu difficulty added for all Namco Originals, and the ability to choose the same song more than once per play.

name: The Abandoned Factory
description: Collect all six 6 keys and kills as many bad guys possible

name: The Fallen Priest
description: A short map requiring Plasma Pak

name: The Lost Temple
description:
There are some rumors about a ruin of a temple deep in the woods where strange things are happening. You are about to find out if this ruin really exists and what evil might has manifested itself in there. But first you have to fight your way into the ruin, as you find out that it is heavily guarded by some cultists and hordes of zombies. You wonder what will be inside this ruin, that seems to be reactivated in some strange way.
Will you be able to fight your way into the ruin...

name: The Old Manor
description: This map was going to be in an episode, but the episode is on hold right now and may not fit in very well.

name: Caleb's Dream
description:
Caleb fell into a deep sleep and...
Well, find out what happened next yourself!

name: Cemetary
description: One huge map

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 6
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 5, featuring 32 new songs and no other notable change from its predecessor.

name: Count of Wallachia
description: You're at Draculas castle, find him... eliminate him.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 7
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 6, Taiko no Tatsujin 7 is a major turning point of the franchise featuring PS2-like graphics thanks to the new Namco System 246 board. All songs are streamlined into 6 genres excluding Game OST which is partially split between Namco Original and Variety until a little later on. Game modifiers such as Go-Go Time and Doron and a Popularity Ranking system were added. However, the Battle Mode and the ability to choose the same song more than once per play were both removed.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 8
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 7, featuring a new Category for Video Game Music, the new Baizoku, Sanbai, Yonbai modifiers, and a Revival Roulette after the first song failed. This game marked an important moment for the Taiko franchise and its crossover with other video game companies for their OSTs such as Nintendo and Square Enix.

name: Bingo TV
description: Sin descripción

name: Bamboo
description:
Bamboo is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly running and cutting bamboo that grows in random places. You score points by collecting bamboo. You can run through yellow bamboo to collect it. When bamboo becomes green, you have to cut it multiple times to stop it and you don't get any points from it. Your goal is to stop bamboo from growing and reaching the top.

The game is over when bamboo reaches the top of the screen.

name: Suicide Guy VR: Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 9
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 8, practically identical to its predecessor other than a few new songs added reaching the milestone of 100 songs in a single Taiko game, the removal of the Song Select mode, and one last modifier called Abekobe was added.

name: Trainz Plus: CD Bmteeo 124
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CD Bmteeo 124 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Normandy Battlepack 3
description: Heroes of Normandy Battle Pack 3 has 12 scenarios. The scenarios cover battles spanning the D-Day drops, fighting the Norman hedgerows and Operation Market Garden.

name: Blazing Sails: Limbs of Lore Pack
description: A true pirate knows that appearance is just as important as skill. So, don't just engage in our epic pirate battles; compete in style too. Keep an eye out for those fresh pirate patches, trade a leg for an anchor, and your hand for a hook, unless you'd rather resemble an octopus.

name: Crescent Quest: Furry Home Expansion
description: This expansion adds another room to your house with a furry aesthetic and a few wallpapers for your device!

name: Wars Across The World: Dacia 101
description: Dacia 101 is Emperor Trajan's first campaign against the Dacians, the empire's last sedentary neighbors. The Romans must crush seize their foes and take their cities. The Dacians player must hold his strongholds, while at the same time waging war within the Roman lands to force them to negotiate.

name: Sclash: Pixels
description: A retro touch to spice up your look in Sclash. Wear a mask and carry a weapon with a low resolution! Includes a new weapon & a new mask, directly unlocked.

name: FPV SkyDive: FPV Drone Simulator - Flight School
description: Continue your journey towards becoming a skilled FPV pilot with ORQA FPV.SkyDive Flight School DLC! This educational module covers the topics of FPV flight throughout 5 units packed with theory and practice.

name: Mario Game
description: A romhack for Super Mario World developed by Draconif.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 10
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 9, introducing secret songs unlockable by doing certain input once a coin was entered in the machine, an option to arrange songs by difficulty, the ability to skip the tutorial, and obviously, new songs.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: The Chrono and the Hare
description:
Version 6.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Chrono Navi
• New Story Chapter XXXIII: In the Name of the Truth
• New Featured Event: Honkai Salvation Log
• ...and more!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 11
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 10, this new title tried to enhance the quality of life for the users by adding the Ura Oni difficulty for the expert players and the Papa Mama Support mode for the young players, it also added the ability to change the sound of the Taiko which already was a thing in the console games, and they removed the Revival Roulette to replace it with the Revival Drumroll minigame.

name: Hot Air 2
description: Sequel to our balloon blowing original. Bosses and surprises galore!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Moonshade Epic
description:
Version 6.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the "The Day of Transcending Finality" arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Jade Knight
• New Open World: New Atra Sanctuary
• New Story Chapter XXXII: End of the World
• New Featured Event: Midnight Chronicle
• ...and more!

name: Skywire VIP
description: Guess the skywire celebrities in this spin off from the Skywire series!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Arrow of Novae
description:
Version 6.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Human: Ego
• New ELF: Elf Elysia
• New Story Chapter EX: Project Stigma
• New Featured Event: Summer Survival Rhapsody Side 13
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Banquet of Helix
description:
Version 5.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the Elysium Everlasting arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Helical Contraption
• New Story Chapter XXXI: Für Elysia
• New Animated Short: Because of You
• New Featured Event: Summer Survival Rhapsody Side A
• ...and more!

name: Polaris
description: Sin descripción

name: Polaris
description: Sin descripción

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Canvas of Stars
description:
Version 5.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Starry Impression
• New Story Chapter XXX: Marcia Funebre
• New Featured Event: The Journey of Painting Stars
• ...and more!

name: Fatal Run
description: The year is 2089. A collision with a comet has left the earth reeling from radiation poisoning. There's little hope for humanity. It's up to you to help the few remaining survivors.

name: H.E.R.O.
description: Sin descripción

name: Caleb Will Have His Revenge On Toronto
description: Caleb Will Have His Revenge on Toronto is a Blood fan add-on by members of the Russian Blood Community which released its first episode, "Scum of Dallas", on July 29, 2013. A sequel, "Run Like a Villain", was begun, but is now not certain to ever be finished. This includes new animated cutscenes, having the Flag of Canada as the menu background, and replacing the Sawed-Off Shotgun and Aerosol Can with their darker versions from the game's development.

name: Front Line
description: Front Line is a vertically scrolling action game. Your mission is to infiltrate enemy territory and destroy their fortress. To reach the fortress, you will have to make your way through varied and dangerous terrain. Jungles, deserts, brush, and rocks all slow your progress, plus each area has numerous enemy fighters and tanks trying to stop you. To help get past these obstacles, you are armed with a machine gun and grenades; at some points in the game you may even come across an abandoned tank which you can control to increase your odds of survival. When you reach the end of the level and successfully destroy the fortress, the game will repeat at a higher level of difficulty. Gameplay is for one or two players, and four different skill levels are available.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Song of Perdition
description:
Version 5.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Elysium Everlasting arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Disciplinary Perdition & Golden Diva
• New Open World: Elysium Everlasting
• New Story Chapter XXIX: Tochter aus Elysium
• New Featured Event: Shattered Dimensions
• ...and more!

name: Dark Times
description: An abstract and somewhat cryptic episode. Only six levels exist now due to being seemingly abandoned.

name: The Way of Ira
description: The Way of Ira is a fan add-on for Blood by MariusArmand currently featuring two chapters, the first released on September 22, 2019 and the second on July 9, 2021. The title is derived from "ira", the Latin word for "rage" (or "ire"). The add-on features narration and new Caleb dialogue performed by David "Tekedon" Wikström, as well as tracks from the Blood Music Project.

name: Front Line
description: You're a lone infantryman on a perilous mission behind enemy lines! The battleground changes constantly as you advance. You'll fight every step of the way through all kinds of treacherous terrain... open roadway, dense underbrush and a danger-laden desert. Do you have the strategy, skill and courage it takes to reach and destroy the enemy's fortress?

name: Time Episode
description: Time Episode is an eight level fan add-on for Blood created by Pyro on September 17, 1999. The player is a mass murderer who in a fit of remorse, or because the authorities have finally caught up to him, leaps off a tall building to end it all, and is sent to hell. From thereon out it is his quest to escape hell through a time gate and then make it back to his own time.

name: It's A War Out There 1
description: Caleb has been hiding out in his cabin for a long time, getting increasingly bored, but weary of all the dangers that lay beyond. After all "it's a war out there". Eventually however, the protagonist decides to venture outward, figuring that all those things that seek to hurt him he can hurt in return, and thereby find his means to amuse himself. The level features cemetery, urban, library, sewer, water, and cave areas and even a laboratory with portals to both the frozen north and to a temple complex. It is here that the player meets his final challenge: two beasts that guard the exit.

name: It's A War Out There 2
description: Caleb finds an axe zombie carelessly wandering around a cliff-face, falling to its death. Caleb figures this must herald a nearby Cabal stronghold, and so he decides to check it out, again to relieve his endless boredom. First he comes across an old library, which he blasts through, before retreating down into the sewers, and again through a laboratory, finding a similar portal that leads out into a lava temple. There he has a surprise encounter with Tchernobog, whom he defeats before once again heading along his way.

name: 500 Milliliters of vr

It features six levels created by three authors, and features numerous replaced assets. Four levels are available for Bloodbath. It is named as a play on the 200 Minutes of /vr/ and related community projects for Doom.

name: Zero Tolerance Origins
description:
Zero Tolerance Origins on retro cartridges will come with the original game Zero Tolerance and the never released sequel Zero Tolerance Underground, which starts right where the first part ends!

Zero Tolerance was one of the earliest first-person titles ever released on Sega Mega Drive and Genesis and is set in a futuristic world where the universe is swarmed by all possible kinds of evil aliens. As highly skilled member of the Zero Tolerance team, you get called to repel the aliens’ invasion and protect mankind from the enemy.
Fight back the aliens’ attack on the spaceship Europe-1 and repel their invasion on earth in Zero Tolerance and hunt down the invaders on a subway mission in the never before released sequel Zero Tolerance Underground!

name: Battlezone
description:
A Port of Battlezone for the Atari 2600.

Commonly considered the earliest progenitor of first-person shooters (FPS), Battlezone is a 3D tank game initially released in the arcades, and later converted officially to many systems. Earth has been invaded, and you and your tank lead the defensive effort. You drive around the battlefield from a first-person view, targeting and firing at tanks, planes and UFOs. You have a radar to help you see where the enemies are in direction and distance. Objects can be used as strategic cover.

Controls simulate the tracks of a tank realistically, so the direction and speed settings are varied - combining forward right and backward left movements (as you can on keyboard versions) sees you change direction more quickly. A standard enemy tank is worth 1,000 points when destroyed; a supertank is worth 3,000 points; and the flying saucer is worth 5,000 points. The guided missile is worth 2,000 points when destroyed. Each of these targets can be destroyed with a single shot from the player's tank. One bonus tank (a bonus "life" or "man") is awarded when the player's score reaches 15,000 points; an additional tank is then awarded at 100,000 points. The player can hide behind the solids or maneuver in rapid turns once fired on to buy time with which to fire himself.

In the adaptation of the award-winning Wingspan: Oceania Expansion embark on a journey through the breathtaking lands of Oceania. Learn about birds from around Australia and New Zealand and all-new resources and mechanics that will enrich your adventure of creating a wildlife preserve.

Wingspan is a relaxing, award-winning strategy card game about birds for 1 to 5 players. Each bird you play extends a chain of powerful combinations in one of your three habitats. Your goal is to discover and attract the best birds to your network of wildlife preserves.

Wingspan: European Expansion takes you on a journey to another continent. Explore diverse European habitats and meet charming, beautiful birds with new interesting abilities.

In the adaptation of the award-winning Wingspan: Oceania Expansion embark on a journey through the breathtaking lands of Oceania. Learn about birds from around Australia and New Zealand and all-new resources and mechanics that will enrich your adventure of creating a wildlife preserve.

In the Seasonal Decorative Pack for Wingspan, you'll get unlimited access to the 7 seasonal backgrounds that have appeared in 2021, along with brand new matching portraits, only available with this pack! With this DLC you will be able to play on your favourite background whenever you want to. Be it a winter background in the middle of summer, or an Easter background in winter - you don’t have to wait for a specific season to use it; you are free as a bird and can choose what and when you want!

name: William and Sly: Classic Collection
description: The world of William and Sly is yours to explore, seeking out collectables and secrets, while soaking in the tranquil visuals and melancholic soundtrack. In this pair of classic Flash games, you play as a fox, running and leaping through an atmospheric ecosystem entirely at your own pace.

name: Yeetus
description: You are YEETUS! Your weapon? The very floor beneath your feet! YEET your surrounding terrain into destructive projectiles. Be strategic, though. A hasty shot may mean a long fall down to your doom in YEETUS, a casual time survivor game with rogue-lite elements.

name: Warpzone Drifter 2
description: With full throttle and no breaks, Warpzone Drifter 2 is a minimalistic, retro-hardcore, physics-based, drifter minigame.

name: Used Cars Simulator
description: Used Cars Simulator - trade used or stolen cars, fix and customize them, drive around, and explore the open world! Grow your business, complete quests, and have fun with a physics-based sandbox!

name: Unwelcome
description: Unwelcome is an 80s-themed survival horror game where you take the role of a night guard at Silver Valley Nature Park, but what starts off as a peaceful job spirals into a dreadful night of hiding from a murderer.

name: Traptile
description: Traptile is a roguelike tower defense. Defend your portals by combining simple traps into intricate contraptions, while taking advantage of the randomly-generated environment and learning how to deal damage efficiently – else you might run out of gold

name: Tower Walker: MMO Grind Simulator - Tower Walker: The Lich
description: TOWER WALKER: THE LICH adds 1 new playable class with a unique set of skills and a special summon to the game

name: Typing Battle
description: "Typing Battle" is a game based on typing speed and accuracy. In this game, players need to use the keyboard to input designated characters in order to defeat their opponents or achieve their goals.

name: Time Loop
description: Time Loop is a 2D platformer with hardcore elements, dynamic gameplay and nice graphics. In this game you need to pass a variety of levels and avoid enemies.

name: Tiny Car Mess
description: A super fun, stylized, derby themed racing game with tiny cars that drift and crash into each other. Take the wheel!

name: Tormenture
description: A disturbing, pixelated game inspired by classic games. Solve puzzles, explore surreal worlds and escape from ghosts to avoid being trapped in the game - be careful, some creatures may break out of the game and lurk in the shadows!

name: Timing Trhthm
description: Unique music rhythm: The game comes with a variety of music, each corresponding to different levels and the appearance of hit objects. Various game modes: Provides a variety of different game difficulties. Social Interaction: The game supports an online ranking system.

name: Ticket to Ride: Round the World Ticket
description: All aboard for the ultimate Ticket to Ride adventure! Build railway networks around the globe, through North America, Europe, and beyond! With the Around the World Ticket, you'll get the European Expansion and 9 more Expansions as they're released!

name: Ticket to Ride: Europe Expansion
description: Hello! Bonjour! Ciao! Hola! Hérete! Buna ziua! The Ticket to Ride European Expansion will take you from coast-to-coast on land and sea as you build your travel network! Tunnel through the Alps, claim ferry routes across the Mediterranean, and complete tickets from Portugal to Poland!

name: The Imperial Capital Burns: Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse
description: A prequel to Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse which follows Takamura Yui and her friends during their time as surface pilot cadets.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Labrador Retriever
description: Introducing the Labrador Retriever, your faithful new hunting partner! This popular and versatile breed can fetch a variety of small game on land or in water.

name: Space Rock Armageddon
description: Space Rock Armageddon is a bold and dynamic space arcade game, boasting lightning-fast gameplay and an explosion of vibrant colors that make it feel like an eighties arcade classic.

name: Star Conflict: Baphomet
description: This pack includes:Jericho rank 17 tackler “Baphomet”Special weapon “Missile module Trinity”Active module “Ties of Shadows”Unique portrait “Sectator”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

name: Star Conflict: Baphomet - Deluxe edition
description: This pack includes:Jericho rank 17 tackler “Baphomet”Special weapon “Missile module Trinity”Active module “Ties of Shadows”Unique modifier “Baphomet” shield recuperator”Unique modifier “Baphomet pulse discharge”Unique portrait “Sectator”Pattern “Threads of power”Decor “Greedy one”Permanent credit reward bonus +10%Additionally, the pilot r

name: StarWinds
description: Embark on an interstellar odyssey of trade and naval combat in StarWinds. Assemble your fleet, navigate dynamic trade routes, and engage in thrilling battles against space pirates. Immerse yourself in this strategic single-player adventure, shaping the cosmos with every decision.

name: Steam Engine Simulator: Power Generation
description: Power a city in Steam Engine Simulator.

name: Struggle F.O
description: What the newly awakened girl saw was an unfamiliar world and unfamiliar creatures. And on her arm, there was a mysterious gadget that could speak. Somehow, the girl who could now communicate with all living creatures, starts to struggle with her allies to survive in this world!

name: Sugar Fruits
description: Sugar Fruits offers a serene puzzle experience where you release a cascade of colorful fruits with strategic taps, aiming to align matching types for chain reactions and high scores before the basket overflows.

name: Super Cave Run
description: Lose your patience, peace and tranquility, trying to save Hat Man from the most dangerous cave in the world.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Peru
description: Puzzles of Peru!

name: Swarmhunters
description: Swarmhunters is a top-down arena action shooter. The war between human and bugs has become worse - Project Swarmhunters emerged at this situation. You play as the best space soldiers in the galaxy and your mission is to strike the hive and hunt down the Emperor, supreme commander of bugs.

name: Thank you for sharing your world
description: This work aimed to reproduce the world experienced by blind people, focusing on the expressive uniqueness of VR.

name: Slam Dunk Basketball
description: Elevate your basketball game with Slam Dunk Basketball. Precision controls, Perspectacles' 3D views, and strategic gameplay redefine virtual sports. Customize, rise through ranks and experience the fusion of tech and hoops excitement. Lace up, don Perspectacles, and revolutionize your virtual game!

name: Rogue Realms
description: Roguelike tower defense where you craft your defense while controling your hero of choice. Navigate through procedurally generated maps and face unpredictable waves. Every run will offer a unique challenge that will make you adapt your strategy and master tower placement and upgrading!

name: Scroll Survival
description: Use the ultimate scroll to survive the endless influx of monsters!

name: Sex Simulator: Vampires
description: An interactive Sex Simulation game with Visual Novel elements, featuring HD graphics and hot animations. Play the role of a handsome century-old Vampire Prince and seduce three sexy mortals to spend eternity by your side as your loving vampire concubines.

name: Shadow Strike: Street Combat
description: Enter the heart-pounding world of Shadow Strike: Street Combat on Steam! Engage in 3D side-scrolling combat, navigating gritty urban landscapes. Master diverse combat techniques, customize your fighter, and gear up for an unparalleled urban battleground. Are you ready to dominate the streets?

name: Snaketris: Rescue 'em all
description: Oh no! Someone is capturing all the birds around the world. It's time for you to rescue them! Snaketris is a puzzle mashup of two classics where your main goal is to liberate all the trapped birds. Unlock cages, collect keys, use bombs and items in your way to become an animal hero!

name: Sees Game
description: Play as Sees in a reimagined take of the classic Snake game. Eat apples and compete with your friends for the hi-score!

name: Rhythm Life
description: Rhythm Life is a role-playing VR rhythm game where players, on various career paths, use their hands to complete rhythmic challenges and achieve fulfilling lives.

name: Pumpkin Party
description: Pumpkin Party brings the Halloween spirit with first-person PvP mini-games. Escape haunted mazes, collaborate in a spooky kitchen, and more. Perfect for festive gatherings and making new friends, it's your go-to for thrilling, laughter-filled Halloween fun!

name: Project: Neo
description: A free-to-play sci-fi action roguelike game set in an alien world where the sun never shines. Explore the world as a ‘Planet Adventurer’. Fight hostile creatures, gather ore, and interact with the local community in your downtime. Upgrade your gear with resources earned during your expeditions.

name: Prepped: Tower Defense
description: Only the paranoid survive, build your defenses and prepare to take on hordes of infected while protecting the trader.

name: Plastic Tactics Online
description: Battle your friends in this action-packed turn-based shooter, starring the little green army men we all know and love! Hone your tactical mastery and shooting skills in this fast-paced battle for living room supremacy- face off with both friend and foe alike to prove your mastery of Plastic Tactics!

name: Panda Magix: Golden Trains Edition - Slots
description: Panda Magix : Golden Trains Edition is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Oriental theme oriented from left to right.

name: Planet Scanner
description: Scan the stars and claim planets for your corporate masters! In Planet Scanner, you will discover unique new worlds, decode transmissions, and upload data all in the name of keeping your job. But what happens if you gaze too long in the void?

name: Project Arcade
description: Project Arcade currently contains a simple yet responsive card matching memory game, with progressively challenging levels, pairs or triples modes, and an automatic save system.

name: My Suika: Watermelon Game
description: A fun watermelon merge puzzle game! Combine various matching fruits to help Kyo gather watermelons!

name: Netdreams Sudoku
description: Netdreams Sudoku ist das klassische Sudoku-Spiel, das viele Stunden lang an verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsgraden teilnimmt. Als Chef, der ein Experte ist, ist Netdreams Sudoku das perfekte Spiel für alle Spieler.

name: Nif Nif
description: Get ready for a gooey good time in this roguelike deckbuilding adventure with Nif Nif, the piglet who's saving the forest one sparkly animal at a time!

name: Of Murder and Moonshine
description: Of Murder and Moonshine, set in prohibition-era New Orleans, is a side-scrolling shooter filled with thoughtful assassinations, frantic getaways, and brutal combat.

name: Oh Yeah
description: How much imagination do you have about the ways of love?

name: One False Move
description: A turn-based strategy game where every unit and choice matters. Master diverse terrains, manage resources, and command futuristic units in a quest for victory. Your battlefield awaits!

name: Movie Cinema Simulator
description: Build the most successful cinema business in the world!

name: Monowave
description: Monowave is a whimsical puzzle-adventure platformer about the transformative power of emotions. Explore beautiful landscapes and empathize with its quirky denizens to restore harmony in an emotionally turbulent universe.

name: Menace from the Deep
description: Menace from the Deep is an enthralling Roguelike Deckbuilding card game that unfolds in a dark world, drawing inspiration from Howard Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos.Set against the backdrop of 1920s USA, the narrative revolves around a clandestine occult society.

name: Lords of Nysera
description: Lords of Nysera is a Tactical RPG inspired by games like Fire Emblem 4, Shining Force, Final Fantasy Tactics, and D&D. As the player, you will recruit beautifully rendered characters each with rich personalities, thoughtful story arcs and unique abilities to aid you in battle.

name: Medville
description: Medville is an indie, single player, real time city builder game. It features complex supply chains of 40 artifacts, a money economy, multiple towns, land and water transportation, designing custom buildings and individually simulated villagers with their own agendas.

name: Teddy
description: A short psychological horror game. As spirits haunt you, your goal is to survive long enough to piece together the world around you.

name: Illang
description: Illang is a free-to-play multiplayer social deduction game where players help the villagers of Koji Village find the sneaky Illang who has been wreaking havoc! From the creators of Second Wave comes a brand new adventure for players! Play with up to 20 players and work together to stop the Illang, but be warned, even your closest ally may turn out to be the very wolf in sheep's clothing you're looking for.

name: Lasers
description: Lasers is a multiplayer game where you must survive deadly laser mazes until only one player remains standing.

name: Last Dream Fishing Arcade
description: Fish your way across lush Gaia in this retro 2D pixel-art fishing RPG. Enjoy a relaxing day or battle for your fishing life against monsters of the deep. With 12 selectable characters, varying difficulty, equipment options, and numerous surprises, you’ll be hooked on this buried treasure of a game!

name: Lightracer Spark: Stars Will
description: The second free DLC of Lightracer: Spark. You will travel to the frontline of cosmic warfare, witnessing the decline and rebirth of a stellar civilization, and making crucial decisions that determine the fate of all beings in the universe.

name: Table Party
description: Welcome to the fantastic boardgame world! If you want to play board games in VR, download Table Party right now! You can enjoy a variety of content in a wonderful virtual space with everyone. Enjoy 9 board games and 4 casual games in a fantastic virtual world with the cool look I imagined! Have fun!

name: ReMix
description: ReMix is a unique musical rhythm action game that combines the elements of Rogue games. In this world, you are able to choose from a variety of heroes with different fighting styles and use the power of music to battle against evil void monsters.

name: The King Of Fighters XV: Character - Hinako Shijo
description: [Product Contents]"Hinako Shijo" can be used in The King Of Fighters XV.

name: Home Design 3D VR
description: With Home Design 3D VR, designing and remodeling your house in VR has never been so quick and intuitive! Accessible to everyone, Home Design 3D VR is the reference interior design application for a professional result at your fingertips!

name: Horny Housewives
description: Horny Housewives is an RPG game that allows you to play as a suburban housewife in a high-stakes world of betrayal, mystery, and adventure. Help attractive women in a suburban neighborhood with their daily tasks, solve puzzles, and make choices that will affect the story.

name: Hungry Cats
description: The cats at home are already crazy with hunger, hurry back and feed them!

name: In Truck Driving
description: This is a driving simulation game that allows you to drive different types of trucks in an open-world city environment.

name: In-Sanity
description: Take control of an everyday blue collar worker trying to make ends meet without becoming completely lost to depression.

name: Immortal Love: Polar Lights Collector's Edition
description: You're off to the Midgard Fair! It's the perfect opportunity for you to make some money selling goods for your upcoming wedding. But your plans are quickly derailed when Loki, God of mischief, accidentally turns your fiancé into a wolf!

name: Idle Mall Tycoon
description: "Have you ever played a tycoon game that is as realistic and visually stunning as the ones you see in the screenshot images? "

name: Into The Noid
description: An atmospheric and enjoyable Noid-like VR brick breaker. With simple, fun mechanics it's ready to deliver both the casual and skill-based experience in addictive bites.

name: Irotoridori No Sekai: The Colorful World
description: When he was a child, Yuuma received a special power from the “translucent magician”, Shinku. Just by touching someone with his hand, he is able to cure all of their wounds in return for some of his memories.

name: I Scream
description: 2046, post-WWIII nation. You spent your childhood locked in the basement. After the rescue, you ended up at the Institution for Abused Children and befriended its outcasts. A day before leaving, your friend committed suicide... Why are you still able to see her?

name: It's All Connected
description: confront anomalies, solve eerie puzzles, and uncover sinister secrets. Jump scares and psychological horror await in this 3D, realistic, indie horror-puzzle game. Are you ready to explore the darkness?

name: Kaiserpunk
description: Build and conquer in Kaiserpunk, the ultimate city builder and grand strategy combo set in an alternative 20th century world. Engage in epic battles on land, sea, and air, or use your economic power to emerge as the ultimate victor.

name: Keep the Heroes Out
description: An asymmetric, cooperative dungeon defense game for 1-4 players where you play as the monsters protecting their hard earned treasures against invading hordes of looters (so-called heroes) trying to steal it.

name: Keyword 2: Nightfall
description: Embark on an adventure to an intricate cyberpunk city shrouded in mystery. Descend into every nook and cranny in the desolate slum; Scale the luxury mansions housing deadly conspiracies. Interrogate deadly witnesses, solve murders and eat hotpot. Join Kurt on his journey of love and justice.

name: Gacha Fever
description: We are proud to show you our little game ! It is a vampire surviror like, but in a cute and colorful universe. You will fight waves of monsters with various weapons, from the machine gun to the magical girl wand !

name: Garden Trills
description:
Explore floating gardens as Tomi, a tiny sparrow. Grow magical plants, meet other birds and get your wings dirty together to cultivate beautiful places for you to peacefully fly around and discover all their secrets.

Garden Trills is a cozy adventure game about exploring whimsical gardens and befriending a charming cast of tiny birds.

name: Gentle Female Boss
description: This is a love theme of AVG, you play the lead role is working internships college students, originally you thought it was just the most common work internship experience, until you met your female boss Mrs Ling, she is always so gentle. As the relationship heats up, you start to have more ideas...

name: Giant Hornet
description: Giant Hornet is a simulator of the survival struggle of a newborn hornet against many enemies in the deadly forest to become a giant queen hornet.

name: Goddess Arrival
description: This RPG idle game combines heart-pounding adventures with strategic brilliance and fun mechanics. Discover a mesmerizing story, breathtaking art, and fantastic H-scenes, as you join the ultimate fight between good and evil, alongside the sexy goddesses.

name: Hidden Object Secrets: Family Revenge Collector's Edition
description: As the weary detective investigates the disappearance of a reputable businessman, suddenly evidence of mafia activity resurfaces, along with sorrow-filled events of the past!

name: Harvest Havoc
description: A mix of farming and slapstick combat, Harvest Havoc is a chaotic multiplayer PvP party game for 2-6 players. Grow, harvest, (steal) and sell your crops to win! Fight with your fists or grow some weapons to smack your rivals and take their crops. Gather your friends online and compete to become the best farmer-warrior!

name: GuildMestar
description: Control, defend, and manage a guildhall in this fantasy, party based, card battler with a heavy focus on trading. Your journey will take you through many procedural generated dungeons on your quest for power.

name: GroundZero
description: GroundZero is an FPS - First Person Shooter Multiplayer that tells the saga of two antagonistic forces. Game story, skins system, season passes and a new game mode for up to 80 players. Grab your weapons, join your friends and reach the top.

name: Goofy Gorillas
description: Relive your childhood nostalgia at Goofy Gorillas, the largest virtual jungle gym! Battle it out with your friends in a wide range of casual but intense PvP gamemodes, or chill out and take part in some extra activities around the venue! Make the Goofy experience your own!

name: Go Some Balls: Only Up and Getting Over It
description: A game that requires you to roll and jump to the top. Go Up and Get Over It with your Guts and Dreams.

name: Gossip & Potions: Tales from the Witch Shop
description: In Gossip & Potions you can create magic potions while you listen to the stories of different characters, help them or create more problems for them. Your decisions will affect the ending of the stories.

name: Grand War: Rome - Free Strategy Game
description: A turn-based strategy war chess game. You will play a commander in the Roman period, and command the generals and troops to complete the specified mission objectives and occupy important strongholds in the level. Rome, Samnite, Epirus, Carthage. Different choices will open different histories!

name: CodeX
description: CodeX is a first person adventure game with a thrilling story told via environmental storytelling. Will you be able to solve the mystery of your past?

name: Climbing Challenge
description: Climb to the highest point and you will win. I will wait for you at the highest point.

name: Divergence
description: Explore a mysterious island with the help of a time manipulation device. Rewind and diverge from your current timeline to combat the ancient guardians and discover the secrets behind Titans.

name: Foxy Tales
description: Get to know all the foxes, because each of them deserves attention. Dreamy, aggressive, funny, sweet - you will find a fox you like!

name: Evil Mountains
description: Evil mountains is an open world survival game that combines aliens, horror, crafting and base building. You are trying to find a girl that has joined an alien-worshipping cult and gone missing somewhere in the Himalayan mountains. Soon you'll discover that aliens are real, and you are their prey

name: Elemental Ascent
description: Master the powers of earth, wind, water and fire to ascend the mountain's peak in this open world third-person puzzle platformer. A lore-rich world is waiting to be discovered in this heartfelt story-driven adventure, focusing on key themes such as family, legacy and humility.

name: Color Splash: Animals
description: Color Splash: Animals is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable animals and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful animal paintings.

name: Conquistador Rex
description: 3 spaniard conquistadors lost in a region of ​​America full of jurassic creatures and other enemies. Conqueror Rex is a 2D platform game to play alone or in local co-op with a fantastic and historical setting. You will have to combine the different skills of three characters to advance

name: Cyber Manhunt: New World
description: A narrative-driven puzzle game that combines themes of big data, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence. Play as an AI assistant in a major corporation. Deploy intricate social engineering tactics and expose hidden truths in a world of ambition, deception, and advanced technology.

name: Cyber Puncake
description: Welcome to your favorite TV show “Goodies Everyday”. "BD Plus" that lets you live different lives in others’ brains. Be a gangster, a pineapple dragon boss, or a snack stall master. Come and watch the first part of BD Plus: Cyber Puncake, where you control the stall master to cook pancakes.

name: Cyber Serpent
description: slither and shoot, but don't run out of space! cyber_serpent is an arcade twin-stick shooter combined with snake. compete for a global high score in this modern take on retro classics as you face infinite waves of polygonal enemies.

name: Dating after becoming Vtuber
description: This is a love simulation game that has Vtuber elements. Players are required to do appropriate poses to serve their fans in live broadcasts.

name: Deaduction
description: An otherworldly social deduction game that combines horror with prop hunt elements. Players must communicate and collaborate in a possessed hotel. The imposter spirits attempt to trap, sabotage and kill the innocent staff members as they earn money for tools that help uncover them.

name: Dice & Fold
description: A turn-based dungeon crawler where your only way of attacking the enemy is by rolling dice. Roll dice to damage enemy cards to FOLD. Inspired by classic Solitaire, in a top-down table and enemies made out of cards, try to beat the dungeon with 20 unique classes. Build your deck, kill monsters.

name: Beast Collector
description: Beast Collector: Capture, Evolve, Battle in this thrilling card game adventure!

name: Birdminton
description: A bird-themed badminton game

name: Block-ed
description: Craft, challenge, and conquer beautiful 3D puzzles in an arcade showdown, where creativity meets competition.

name: Boxing School: Solo Career Mode
description: In Boxing School: Solo Career Mode you become a boxer in the 80s. You train, you fight and climb the ranks. Play your own career story from beginner to star. This new expansion puts you into the shoes of a rookie boxer trying to survive.

name: BreadAttack
description: You know what’s cool? A duck! You know what’s even cooler? A duck with a gun rescuing his home and family!

name: Bugs N' Guns
description: Bugs N' Guns is a cooperative third person shooter. Player will need to combine their weapons firepower to eliminate enemies and obstacles as players try to protect a train called MARC - OS from hostile flora and fauna.

name: Canter Crossing
description: Saddle up and ride away on an daring adventure!

name: Carsick Carventure
description: Carsic Carventure is a simple hyper-casual game where you drive your 2D car as far as possible. Discover new places, set new records, and beat your friends! Enjoy infinite levels and different game modes!

name: Catechesis
description: Embrace the darkness as a demon-possessed altar boy in this Horror RPG. Explore the city, battle demons, upgrade your weapons, and embark on an unforgettable journey with unique characters and anime-style cutscenes.

name: Centrist
description: Small tetris type game where your goal is to place block around center piece in perfect rectangle formation. Blocks will appear from 4 different direction.

name: Chronical
description: The power is at your fingertips! Take control of a powerful Chronomancer in this mysterious puzzle-platformer. Explore the Chronical school to discover its secrets and learn new spells. Can you save all of the professors and reveal the mystery of the Time Loop?

name: Chrono Mirror
description: Bend time and space in this story-driven 2D platformer with branching story paths and converging timelines! Heavily inspired by the Mega Man Zero Series and Azure Striker Gunvolt Series.

name: Christmas Runner
description: "Christmas Runner - Rocket Boot Adventure" is an exciting Christmas-themed parkour game where players become a rocket boot runner, navigating diverse terrains, overcoming various obstacles, and pushing their limits.

name: Armor Blitz
description: Armor Blitz is a perfect couch game with friends or go online to battle in various multiplayer modes. Destroy other tanks, grab boosts and navigate through dozens of maps in single player or co-op campaigns; fight other players in PVP or teams mode in this game that hearkens back to the classics.

name: Asteroid King
description: Fast pace shooter that mainly focuses on Fun Factor, game mechanics and AWESOME FACTOR! The game is a blast from the past with updated features. If you are looking for a game with great mechanics and cool factor, you have found it!

name: Astroswarm
description: Fight for your life against the incoming swarm of zombified astronauts in ASTROSWARM! Use a variety of weapons, turrets, and power-ups to survive!

name: Barrhell
description: Within the depths of a sinister cave, a man, cursed by an evil barrel has been transformed into a demon. To find freedom he must use his newly aquired tail to escape.

name: Basterd Blitz
description: Basterd Blitz is a top-down 3D arena shooter roguelite where you play as an allied soldier with up to 3 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of Nazis during WW2. Choose from a variety of characters with different traits, buy items and upgrade weapons to create unique runs and kill some Nazis.

name: 100 Christmas Cats
description: Can you find 100 adorable cats hidden in Christmas streets? Test your attention in this cozy charming hand-drawn hidden object game. 100 Christmas Cats are waiting for you in the BEST hidden objects game! ️‍ Can you find them all? ️‍

name: 100 Christmas Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Christmas Cats.

name: 24H Stories: The Blackout
description: You are a young boy. Tonight, your parents have gone out, leaving you alone at home overnight. Soon after, strange things start happening: your head inexplicably starts to ache, you realize your brother is missing, and there's a sudden commotion outside the door...

name: Aarik: and the Ruined Kingdom
description: Aarik (and the ruined kingdom) is a perspective based puzzle game centred around a Prince trying desperately to repair his father's kingdom. Using a magical crown Aarik must grab, roll, move and mend to save his homeland and his family.

name: Adventures in Anglonia
description: A language learning game created for a master's thesis -- play as one of four unique adventurers in the mysterious land of Anglonia, searching for the wish-granting artifact, the Heart of the Word. Practice listening comprehension, TOEIC vocabulary, and problem-solving.

name: Anon's Neko Waifus
description: Discover an enchanting world where cute neko girls await to steal your heart. Immerse yourself in a tale of romance and emotions. It's the perfect getaway for a good time.

name: Apartus
description: A True Oldschool Turn-Based RPG that takes you on a dangerous journey to find a powerful lost relic.

name: Arcade Asylum
description: Step into the world of "Arcade Asylum", a fast-paced multiplayer extravaganza where players compete in a variety of mind-bending mini-games to race against the clock and each other for the ultimate prize - their freedom! Are you ready to put your skills to the test and outwit your fellow inmates?

name: A-Red Walking Robot
description: A-Red Walking Robot is a physics based toy robot simulator where you pilot tiny A-Red, a small clockwork operated robot that needs to overcome the trials it’s creator set in a workshop. A miniature nerve-wrecking/patience-proving journey where you are granted to fall… a lot.

name: Kinesis
description: "Psycho Kinesis" Rotation action

name: Dreamin' Cat
description:
Dreamin' Cat - a little platformer game about how a cat is trying to get rid of nightmares, get some food and find a way home.

Use arrow keys to move, Z to jump. Use headphones for a better experience.

The game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 47.

name: Queue Simulator
description: experience the thrill of waiting in a long line

name: Gotcha Number for Playdate
description:
OK Inspector! You are kidnapped! Gotcha! You must figure out how to escape the room within 10 minutes...and then... your time is up!! Got your number!! Point and click and piece clues together... Use your magnifying glass and search around. It reminds me a little of the first part of Dove and War game, but without WW2 theme...

Tilt to look around room. Hurry!

P.S. Now with answer video!

name: Scythe Shepard
description: Playdate game for PlayJam#4

name: Snooze or Lose
description: Submission for the Play Jam 4!

name: Mar Koochooloo
description: Snake game for Playdate with nine levels and a "Gentle Mode" for new players.

name: Time Shared
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat-Like Concentration
description: Cat themed game of Concentration! A fun memory card game for the Playdate!

name: Patience Playdate
description: A playdate game where you take care of a bonsai

name: Net-tac-toe
description: Online tic-tac-toe for Playdate!

name: The King of Alzoria
description: A game where you talk to a tyrant king

name: About Time
description: Simple time puzzle converting from digital to analogue

name: Time Climber
description: Gotta climb to find time!

name: Tic Toc Shoc for Playdate
description: A quick Jam game for Play Jam 4 (theme: "your time is up"), created in a day

name: Time Flies Like An Arrow
description: A short game playdate developed during PlayJam4

name: Counterglass
description: PlayJam 4 entry. The world's only game with music in 69/16.

name: Runaround Reaper
description: Evade death for as long as possible! A PlayJam 4 game.

name: Stuck Like a Stone
description: Try to reach the end of the levels before you're stuck like a stone. Made during PlayJam 4.

name: Project Code Neon Mafia
description: Young members of the Mafia fight, rebel, and entrust their hopes to their friends to fight corruption, confront evil, and challenge fate.

name: Project Code Kaleido Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: The Red Bell’s Lament
description:
The Redbell Tree scrapes the sky, standing proudly in the heart of Hemeria, a land of sunlight. In a land ruled by a monarchy for generations, humans lived in peace and tranquility. That is, until the dawn of the day the world was dyed red.

On that day, vampires laid waste to Hemeria. They preyed on, devoured, and devastated its inhabitants. A great many people would go on to mourn their loved ones, their families and friends, for the rest of their lives. One particular town of Hemeria bore such a tragedy. A single girl was left alone in despair and disgrace. She vowed revenge, and grew into one of Hemeria's finest vampire hunters.

And one day, she became a member of the Elpis 7; those who inspired a light of hope in its people.

One day, she receives a letter from an unknown sender. Upon her arrival to the mansion indicated inside, she finds vampire hunters and a royal knight awaiting her. The hunters assembled receive an order from the monarch.

They are to form a squad and invade Nyx, the world of vampires. A shiver of anticipation crackles through her at the opportunity she's been waiting for her whole life. However, this is but the beginning of a game wherein the fate of her world is at stake. Pawns are sent forth, discarded, hidden out of sight...

And just how many will remain when this all comes to an end?

name: Anemoi
description: An upcoming visual novel from Key.

name: Vending Mayhem
description:
Imagine a world where a single penny stands against the tyranny of sugary drinks and aluminum cans. You play as our brave, pocket-sized protagonist who's tired of being jingled around in wallets, purses, and the depths of forgotten drawers. This penny is no ordinary currency; it's a fighter, and it's ready to punch its way out of a sticky situation.

The setting is within the confines of a vending machine, where rows of tantalizing canned beverages line the shelves, tempting the thirst of unsuspecting customers. Our hero despises these soda and cola cans and is determined to escape the mechanical prison. But it won't be easy – the path to freedom is filled with challenging obstacles and formidable foes.

Vending Mayhem is a humble, amateur creation that promises a simple and entertaining gaming experience. Will you conquer the vending machine's mayhem and find your way to freedom in this pixelated world?

name: Mechachain
description: Tps game on mobile where you fight with Mechas.

name: Marble Champions
description: Marble Champions is a thrilling marble racing game that will put your skills and reflexes to the ultimate test. Navigate through intricate tracks, overcome obstacles, and rely on your skills to triumph over your rivals. As you advance through the game, you'll discover a trove of unique marbles. Each marble, with its unique appearance and stats, will become your secret weapon for dominating rivals and conquering every track in style. Engage in daily time trials and tournaments to prove yourself against other players.

name: A Voz do Operário
description: A Voz do Operário is a narrative game about the 70s Brazilian working class amid the economic crisis, repression, and censorship during the Brazilian military dictatorship.

name: Mooon
description: Mooon it's a simple platform game, based on a boy who is looking for his imaginary friend, Waldo.

name: Pinball M: Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball
description:
Hail to the King baby!

We couldn’t be more excited to reveal the next pinball table coming to Pinball M, the game that will haunt pinball players in their worst nightmares!

name: Score of a Lifetime
description: Money! Romance! Cars! Half a billion dollars is up for grabs. Track down the fortune without letting a new flame steal your heart—unless that’s your plan! When a vehicle with a million-dollar bounty goes missing, you and your boss know it must lead to an even bigger payday.

name: Afterlife Pharmaceuticals
description: Life is a health journey, with ups and downs, which can be big or small, lifelong or momentary. We, at Afterlife, are there for those challenges, by the side of people, as a health journey partner from life and beyond.

name: Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks
description: Step into the shoes of Rachel as she embarks on a journey guided by the personality core named "SAIC," through the Forbidden Testing Track, Codename: "Quebeck Seven."

name: Midnight Lights
description: Midnight Lights is a first-person person horror walking sim where you find yourself trapped in a national park with a creature who hunts you by disguising itself as street signs.

name: Eternity
description: Eternity is a 2D turn-based RPG that immerses players in a world of fantasy and adventure. Heroes and players take turns casting magical abilities to clear rooms of enemies and receive randomly generated loot. Gameplay includes questing via a quest book, climbing the infinitely tall Dark Tower, crafting items and new heroes at the forge, building the strongest team possible with character management, and teaming up with other heroes in co-op multiplayer.

name: The Last Orpheus
description: The Last Orpheus is a first-person horror game with music mechanics inspired by Ocarina of Time.

name: Mythic Dreams
description: Explore the mysterious landscapes of a vast dream in this atmospheric exploration game with PSX visuals.

description:
You need me...
