I'm here...
Reaching out...
I can help you...

If you let me in...

name: Touhou Houtenkyou: Treasure Castle Labyrinth
description:
A glittering galaxy awaits inside! If you want treasure, get ready to dig! A retro-colorful dark-pop exploration STG fantasy!

Touhou Houtenkyou ~ Treasure Castle Labyrinth is a fan-made Touhou Project game made using the Touhou Danmakufu ph3sx shooting game engine.

Treasure Castle Labyrinth was first conceptualized as a hypothetical Touhou fangame by Iroboshi of iroirodou around the release of Undefined Fantastic Object, and was later made into a music album in 2014 with the help of Pesot.jp/. Development of the Treasure Castle Labyrinth game began in 2018, spearheaded by DOGSDAY. In 2020, the members of both iroirodou and DOGSDAY came together and established a common circle dedicated to the game's development: UWASA Enterprise.

name: The Overlook Rehaunted
description: All work and no play makes Jacka a dull boy...

name: PilgrimAge
description: PilgrimAge is a solo-developed souls-like game, set in a medieval world inspired by PS1 aesthetics and the souls universe.

name: 5 Points Mall
description: A group of friends breaks into an abandoned mall...

name: Skeleport Energy
description:
Skeleport Energy will take you on a wild journey through unpredictable locations as Skully The Skeleton! Your mission is to find your way out of crazy whacky situations by reaching a vending machine that sells Skeleport Energy- Energy drink!

With Skeleport Energy, Skully can become anyone's skeleton! Only problem being, that Skully has no control over, who they'll become and this leads into many problematic situations that you'll have to figure your way out of!

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos: Limited Edition
description: Includes R-Type Tactics I・II Cosmos: Deluxe Edition, 2-Disc Soundtrack, Conceptual Art Card Set (Set of 6), R-9A Arrowhead Acrylic Stand, B-1D Bydo System Alpha Acrylic Stand, Collector's Box

name: Snacktorio
description:
Snacktorio is a factory-cooking simulator where you must satisfy the appetites of unspeakable horrors... with food!

Build and manage sprawling networks of machines & pipes to mass produce delicious meals that can satiate the endless hunger of the beasts that are invading your home. Order Up!

name: BoohaBlox: Arcade
description: BoohaBlox Arcade: is a Pixel-art puzzle game inspired by /Puzzle League/Panel de Pon/Tetris Attack/ games. This Arcade version is fully free, and offers the full package of the arcade mode, with 3 game modes: Marathon, Timed, and Endless!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - The Traitor Curse Part 1
description:
To celebrate the first anniversary of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, we have prepared a free, two-part update called The Traitor Curse bringing more content to the game. Part 1 will release during November, Part 2 will follow before the winter holidays.

The Traitor Curse Part 1 - Features:

New Cinematic: Learn about the motivations of the Moebian 6th and discover The Carnival, a new disreputable zone promising transgressive distractions and entertainment.
New Zone & Mission: Strike at the heart of the Moebian 6th operations and fend off hordes of enemies in Mercantile located in The Carnival.
Inspect Feature: Inspect player loadouts in The Mourningstar.
Update to Veteran Talent Tree: Enjoy many changes and tweaks made to the Veteran tree, including the addition of Keystones (due to these changes, Veterans will see their talent tree reset and players will have to re-assign talent points).

name: The Mountain is as It Always Was
description: A small narrative game about mountains, emptiness, loss, and remembering what it means to be alive.

name: The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Year 5 Season 1: Broken Wings
description: In the wake of the attack at the White House, The Division has discovered that 11 people are unaccounted for and considered missing. You will be tasked to go on a high-stakes rescue mission to find the missing civilians, as they have valuable intel on the White House and The Castle Settlement.

name: Halo CE+
description: Halo CE+ is a 20th anniversary project by VKMT that encompasses all 3 main versions of Halo Combat Evolved: MCC, Custom Edition, and even Original Xbox. 4 brand new MP maps are included featuring new weapons, content, and even restored cut content from Halo 1's development. MCC users will also get 2 additional party maps. Users will also be able to download the tags and content used to build the mod and create their own maps.

name: Mega R-Type
description: It's R-Type arcade action for your SEGA 16-bit System! An unofficial port of R-Type for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

name: Friend Hunt
description: Friend Hunt is a very short RPG Maker 2003 game. The game deals with a bunny name Cinnamon as the find themselves trying to befriend someone. Who is out to kill them.

name: Stackopolis
description: The mission of Stackopolis is to recreate a blueprint pattern to complete each level. Move blocks with your mouse and recreate the building.

name: Cult Adorable
description: You play as a cult leader named Kiki, who wants as many people as possible to join her cute cult. Now she is very interested in one student, whom she considers an ideal recruit and is trying very hard to make him a part of her cult. I am sure you will enjoy accompanying Kiki and her friend Kotoko along the way.

name: Night, Hood and the Mysterious Traveller
description: The game follows a girl named Dust as she is sent on a quest to bring bread and pie to a nearby village by the name of Woodpine. On the way she meets a charismatic young traveler who offers to aid her on her journey. When they arrive to the village they quickly discover that the village is not as peaceful as it seems. Young children have gone missing in the village, one after the another, during the last few months and as a result the village is in disarray. Will Dust with the help of her newfound friend, solve the enigma surrounding the missing children or will the dark secret of the village of Woodpine be left forever shrouded in mystery?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Yorha Squadron Pack
description:
A mod that adds 2 leaders, alongside the Yorha Squadron civilization. 2B as a leader gains production based on the strength of enemies killed, and gains a bonus yield % too all cities when capturing one. White gains a bonus production per trade route, increasing the output per era, and gaining additional gold per city that it passes. The civilization bonus are as follows:

- Unique tile improvement (Resistance Camp)
- Unique support unit (Pod)
- Unique city projects (Android Production)
- Adds music from the Nier franchise to the game
- And much more!

name: Bowser's Revenge 3
description:
Just a normal standard hack. A bit shorter than the previous games, with this one only having 5 worlds?

Anyway lots of custom stuff in this hack. Music, sprites, graphics and stuff.

name: FutSim
description: FutSim was a Brazilian massively multiplayer online game where the user takes on the role of a soccer club manager.

name: Super Mario Horizons
description: Mario wants to have a party, when mysteriously his friends disappear. Then Rokko-chan appears and tells him that it's not just them, but that lately people have been disappearing from different places. Mario together with Rokko-chan must solve the mystery and rescue his friends in an 8-world adventure, with bosses from different games.

name: Luigi's Adventure OSE
description: A romhack for Super Mario World with 87 exits

name: Play To Win
description: A romhack for SMW with 32 exits.

name: Luigi's Misadventures 5: Rougenia Merald's Challenge
description: A romhack for SMW by Roberto zampari with 112 exits

name: Mario vs. Bowser and Mighty No. 9
description: A romhack for SMW by Roberto Zampari with 80 exits.

name: Ami
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to Paradize
description: Paradise isn't exactly what you hoped for: it's infested with zombies! Thankfully, you can control them. Capture them and teach them to farm or fight. They will help you defend your camp while you explore the world looking for… a new paradise.

name: The X-Com Files
description: This megamod will allow you to grow X-Com from its humbled beginnings, as a two-men team travelling the world in an expensive-looking car to global the military force we all know and love. It contains many, many additions, like new mission types, enemies, equipment and story arcs (including the entirety of my previous project, the Final Mod Pack). It also places the game a bit more firmly in the 90's conspiracy genre and its clichés.

name: DragonBox Elements
description:
Save Euclid's Island from Osgard
The goal of the game is simple - build an army to defeat the evil dragon, Osgard. Behind each level are the properties of shapes, with each move you are interacting with geometric proofs.

Build Your Army
To help you defeat Osgard and win the game, you must build an army. Your army is full of cleverly hidden shapes that only appear once you have successfully completed the proof.

Who is Euclid? What are his Elements?
DragonBox Elements takes its inspiration from “Elements”, one of the most influential works in the history of mathematics. Written by the Greek mathematician Euclid, "Elements" describes the foundations of geometry using a singular and coherent framework. Its 13 volumes have served as a reference textbook for over 23 centuries, and DragonBox Elements makes it possible for players to master its essential axioms and theorems after just a couple of hours playing!

name: DragonBox Algebra 5+
description:
So Easy a 5-Year-Old Can Do It
It's never too early to start learning algebra. You can easily grasp basic algebraic concepts and operations over ten chapters of the game. An instant feedback mechanism helps you understand what you're doing wrong to gain a sound understanding of algebra.

How does it work?
Over the course of the game, the cards with drawings are slowly replaced with variables and numbers. Little by little, you learn the operations needed to isolate "X" on one side of the game board.

name: DragonBox Algebra 12+
description:
Build a Greater Understanding of Algebra
With more levels and more advanced equations Algebra 12+ moves beyond its critically acclaimed predecessor, Algebra 5+.

More Levels & Harder Equations
Algebra 5+ gave us the basics, now comes the hard part. In Algebra 12+ you deep dive into advanced algebraic concepts.

Covered in the App: Addition, Division, Multiplication, Parentheses, Positive/Negative Signs, Addition of Fractions (Common Denominator), Collection of Like Terms, factorization, Substitution.

name: Frog Paradise
description: Frog Paradise is an MMO where you play as a frog in a magical world full of mysteries. Explore the world, earn your living, dress up your frog and socialise with others.

name: Buggy Racers
description: Be a different kind of beetle. Grab your turbocharged matchbox and do the most thrilling overtaking. Crazy tracks and crazy opponents. A game with lots of action and fun to keep you glued to your computer.

name: Fat Princess: Fat Roles
description:
Ninjas, Pirates and Giants!
Now you can add three new classes to Fat Princess and gain the upper hand against your enemy!
Download the Fat Princess: Fat Roles Expansion pack today to add the new classes and expand your battle royale experience!

name: Friendzoned
description: Friendzoned is a texting chat story and SMS game in which you get to communicate with a girl named Amy through text messages and you decide how the story goes. Is it going be a love story? Or is it going to be a pure friendship?

name: Greenman
description:
When the planets align, and the stars shine the brightest they ever have, a hero shall rise. But this hero doesn't have muscles, isn't a vampire, AND is literally just a box. Meet GREENMAN, the most handsome (note: contest was self-managed) video game hero of ALL TIME!

You must face over a variety of different obstacles, using the magical instrument known as "MOUSE AND KEYBOARD" to control Greenman. Promise you won't die though, right?

name: Friendzoned 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Friendzoned 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Friendzoned 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Brox
description: Brox is a sandbox, scriptable shooter. Play unique game modes againts bots or players and create your own using simple to use JavaScript scripting!

name: Teardown: Time Campers
description: Saddle up and prepare for a wild ride back to a time when explosives were made from dynamite and sledgehammers were... still sledgehammers. Let your destructive imagination run rampant as you execute daring escapades across a fully destructible wild west.

name: Temple Crawler
description: A tactical roguelike dungeon crawler, featuring an intuitive yet deep core mechanic. Acquire powerful artifacts to forge your path through dungeons filled with ruthless enemies and dangerous traps. Embark on this epic adventure and fulfill your quest for glory!

name: The Christopher Redemption: I
description: The Christopher redemption part I is a story-driven action thriller game that explores the intense and original story of Christopher and his sister.

name: The Piece
description: “The Piece” is a simple & fun block puzzle game, train your spatial ability!

name: Tiny Vikings
description: TINY VIKINGS: JOURNEY TO ASGARD is an action adventure game revolving around a gang of Viking children who embark on an adventurous journey to seek the favor of the gods and save their home village from an evil curse.

name: Virar
description: Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies, live an intense story of survival and face implacable hordes in this fast-paced game of action and strategy.

name: Where are my potatoes 2: Land Of Mystery
description: Kake potato character is coming back. Now Kake trashed in Land of Mystery where his mission is to collect different fruits and find again missing potatoes

name: Unforgotten: Ordinance
description: Face your fears, uncover the secrets of the past and fulfill your own destiny. In the wild impenetrable forests of Siberia you will face those who look beyond our reality and only the right choice will allow you to reach the end. Test yourself in a new psychological ethno-horror.

name: You Got Crabs
description: Watch your crabs live their lives and force evolutionary changes by altering the environment in this calm, relaxing life simulator

name: Spill the Beans
description: A secret recipe has been stolen and you’re charged with finding the culprit…trouble is, you’re the one whodunnit. Investigate, interrogate and manipulate your way to framing the perfect scapegoat in this reverse detective visual novel.

name: Spava
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of dreams, where each location is a unique story. Explore dreams, free them from nightmares, and restore comfort and harmony to this magical area of imagination.

name: SoundTown
description: An accessible one-button music game for children and young people with complex physical and cognitive needs.

name: Shelter of Exiles
description: Shelter of Exiles is a tactical hack'n slash MMORPG with the economic development of the player base. Enhance your hero, amass a mighty arsenal, and obliterate the most formidable monsters alone or with friends and guild members.

name: Sex Massage
description: In the exciting visual novel Sex Massage , you will take on the role of a young massage parlor owner in a picturesque resort town. The main character has inherited this spa and is facing incredible challenges and opportunities

name: Tavu
description: Tavu is a PvE RTS game with a tactical combat system. Build your bases and defend them against waves of enemy attacks. Upgrade your units and destroy enemy bases to gain new territories and resources.

name: Taiko Frenzy
description: Taiko Frenzy: A rhythmic adventure that lets you drum to the beat! Master the art of Taiko drumming in this captivating VR rhythm game.

name: Stray Blade: Valley of Strays
description: Sixth months have passed after Farren and Boji's last adventure in Stray Blade. Join both in the next chapter and protect Acrea from a new enemy which threatens to take over the long-forgotten land.

name: Luster Beasts
description: Luster Beasts is a Pokémon Stadium style RPG where the player needs to build a team of Luster Beasts in order to take out as many enemy teams as possible before being defeated.

name: Midnight Margo
description: A narrative-driven roleplaying adventure with a touch of absurdity

name: Plus Ultra: Legado
description: Immerse yourself in a Mesoamerican metroidvania adventure, featuring vivid ligne-claire comic visuals set in the 16th century. Explore the intersection of two worlds in this spellbinding tale base on historical background with rich lore, dynamic combat, and a captivating soundtrack.

name: Probot Soccer
description: Probot Soccer is a third person soccer-style sports game where the player controls a robot. The aim of the game is to kick the soccer ball into the AI robot opponent's goal. The game includes various levels of difficulty that increase the number of rounds to play against the AI opponent to win.

name: Reckless Rally
description: Reckless Rally Is A Small Casual Rally Racing Game. Try And Set A PB On The Two Tracks Or Build Your Own Based Off Real World Roads!

name: Roseline
description: Roseline is an ambitious fantasy visual novel, focused on cinematic storytelling and a narrative about love, grief and finding purpose. Follow two childhood friends, Ash and Lily, in this first chapter of a large, impressive tale.

name: Schrödinger's Call
description: I am Mary. The last person in the world you'll ever talk to. Schrodinger's Call" is an adventure game that uses a mysterious phone to connect with souls who cannot die. The main character, Mary, wakes up in a strange room with no memory. The player, along with the bewildered Mary, will save souls.

name: Rekindling The Flame
description: Rekindling the Flame is an action RPG game. Hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies. Rebuild your town, Upgrade your equipment, and bolster your skills to face even greater challenges.

name: Elephant Rave
description: Sin descripción

name: Dimlight Dungeon
description: A dark fantasy dungeon crawler where the player controls a reptilian brawler and travels within the ruins of a once mighty heroic fortress.

name: England in London
description: England in London is a surrealist satirical dark comedy adventure game with an emphasis on atmosphere, characters and mini-games. Featuring weird looking art, hand drawn animation and an ambient score for when you truly want to be left alone.

name: Gräuel
description: GRÄUEL is a cooperative survival horror game for 1 to 6 players. Discover who continues to nurture the horrific abominations of the Nazis and stop them. Survive the crises of the abominations or descend into hell.

name: Fairy Carrots
description: Stealth action exploration game in which a "little hater" hides in a shared house where nine girls live and runs around looking for carrots.

name: HardAF
description: A punishing precision-based, speedrun 2D platformer...in the dark. Uncover the level with every death, earn swag and unlock new chapters. Run, Jump, Dash, Die, Repeat.

name: Harvest Knight
description: This is a farm management game with combat elements, where players can plant plants and raise animals to obtain the necessary resources for battles. At the same time, they can collect resources to strengthen your farm during battles and use various decoration props to decorate your farm.

name: HelloWorldFactory
description: A quick programming language quiz is now available! Just read the code and choose a compiler that can output "Hello World"! A simple game you can play in your free time!

name: HoloParade
description: Collect your favorite characters, nurture them, and have fun just watching in this hololive fan game! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth for dedicated players, strategic elements, and easy enjoyment for casual players.

name: Ice Land
description: A game that simulates survival in harsh cold environments, including game elements such as environmental exploration, technology development, and character development.

name: Kill the Reaper
description: Reaper losing control over the taken souls and now all hell breaks loose.Hold back armies of the dead and find out, how long does it take to Kill the Reaper?

name: Jigsaw Advent Calendar
description: Surprise yourself every day leading up to Christmas with new challenging jigsaw puzzles in Jigsaw Advent Calendar

name: In Her Head
description: This is a short visual novel that immerses the player in the inner world of the main character, who suffers from social anxiety and is afraid even of a simple phone call. Experience with her the anxiety, procrastination, and constant struggle with herself.
